content:

moving image ("synching") will be considered a Derivative Work for the purpose of this Licence.
"Licence" means this Creative Commons England and Wales Public Licence agreement.

"Licence Elements" means the following high-level licence attributes indicated in the title of this Licence:
Attribution, Share-Alike.
"Original Author" means the individual (or entity) who created the Work.
"Work" means the work protected by copyright which is offered under the terms of this Licence.

For the purpose of this Licence, when not inconsistent with the context, words in the singular number
include the plural number.

duration of copyright in the Work.

HOWEVER,

FINALLY,

the Work; or
any Derivative Work; or

the Work as incorporated in a Collective Work

Warranties and Disclaimer

Subject to any liability which may not be excluded or limited by law the Licensor shall not be liable and

The rights granted to You under this Licence shall terminate automatically upon any breach by You of the
